options.name: user
options.description: The user whose balance you want to check.

options.name: add
options.description: Amount to add to balance (Admin Only).

options.name: remove
options.description: Amount to remove from balance (Admin Only).

options.name: pay
options.description: Amount to pay to another user.

name: balance
description: Check your balance, someone else's balance, add or remove balance (Admin Only).

name: dustin
description: Sends a random image from dustin's folder!

name: leaderboard
description: View the top users with the highest balance

options.name: bet
options.description: The amount you want to bet on the lottery

name: lottery
description: Start or participate in a lottery.

name: risk
description: Shows the success chances of all commands.

options.name: target
options.description: The user you want to rob

options.name: amount
options.description: The amount of dustollarinos you want to steal
